title: I don't like tattoos on girls
body:
http://www.returnofkings.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/02/before-after-b-1-667x402.jpg

It's gross. It's like girls with scars. It decreases the aesthetic value of the human being.

Edit: I literally didn't break any rules here. You're locking the topic because it's an unpopular opinion and it's a persuasive argument. Then you strawman me ostensible unable to respond.
